gov.nih.nlm.meme.server
Class MIDDataSourcePool

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nlm.meme.server.MIDDataSourcePool
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
public class MIDDataSourcePool
extends Object
implements Initializable

Represents a pool of database connections. It minimize the overhead associated with opening database connection. To use this class you must first set up all the necessary system properties The required properties are:

  • DataSourceConstants.DP_OPTIMAL_SIZE
  • DataSourceConstants.DP_MAX_SIZE
  • DataSourceConstants.DP_AUTOEXTEND
Then create a data source pool object and initialize it by passing an instance of an InitializationContext. For example,

   InitializationContext server = new MEMEApplicationServer();
   MIDDataSourcePool dsp = new MIDDataSourcePool();
   dsp.initialize(server);

Author:
MEME Group

the MIDDataSource
